content: here is a 2d to 3d star amigurumi with this pattern you will make 2 star appliques and then join them together with a single_crochet border to create a 3-d star version it also works as a great little trinket but can also function as a pin cushion give it eyes and you have an instant starfish or invincible star perhaps you have a star student which you can award them this awesome star as well or use thinner yarn to just create appliques and make them into starry garlands to hang up for some fun decor or how about a fairy star wand to grant wishes i think kirby amigurumi 1 would also appreciate having a warp star to help with this travels the possibilities are endless just like the starry sky **approximate size ** 4 inches wide ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ i d love to see how your project turns out tag me with your projects on instagram @ami_amour 2 also you can crochet along with me with the star amigurumi tutorial 3 on my youtube channel and see the star in action ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **level ** easy **need to know ** single_crochet in the round single_crochet in row chain stitch 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/kirby-amigurumi-9 2 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 3 https //youtu be/skldkhbk7yu
